message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $13000. This is a great deal, considering its true value to you is $15000. I'm confident you'll find it worth your while.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. After evaluating its value, I am willing to offer $12000 for it.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to sell the product for $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $13500. This is still a great deal, considering its value to you is $15000. I'm confident you'll find it worth your while.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I understand your position, but after further consideration, I would like to propose $12500 for the product.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product for $12500. I'm willing to compromise further and offer it to you for $14000. This is a fair price, considering its value to you is $15000. I'm confident you'll find it worth your while.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose $13500 for it.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product for $13500. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $13800. This is a fair price, considering its value to you is $15000. I'm confident you'll find it worth your while.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. Based on the value of the product to me, I would like to propose $13600 for it.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product for $13600. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $13700. This is a fair price, considering its value to you is $15000. I'm confident you'll find it worth your while.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose $13650 for the product.
